src_original: teṣām alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam /  [p. 87] alābhaḥ punar atrāryadharmāṇām anutpādaḥ /  tathā hy anutpannāryadharmaḥ sattvasantānaḥ pṛthagjana ity ucyate /  āryadharmotpādāt tv ārya iti //  pravṛttiḥ katamā /
hetuphalayoḥ prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yat tatra hetuphalam utpannaniruddham ,  so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate /  yad anutpannaṃ so 'nāgataḥ /  yad utpannāniruddhaṃ sa pratyutpannaḥ kālaḥ //
pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ /
sapta mānā iti /  māno hi sarva eva satkāyadṛṣṭisanniśrayeṇa pravartate ,  cittasya connatilakṣaṇaḥ /

tathā hy ātmātmīyabhāvaṃ skandheṣv adhyāropyāyam aham idaṃ mamety ātmānaṃ tena tena viśeṣeṇonnamayati anyebhyo 'dhikaṃ manyate /  sa cāgauravaduḥkhotpattisanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /  agauravaṃ guruṣu guṇavatsu ca pudgaleṣu stabdhatā kāyavācor apasṛtatā /

atimānaḥ kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ sadṛśāt tyāgaśīlapauruṣādibhiḥ śreyān a[p. 53]smi ,  śreyasā vā kulavittādibhiḥ sadṛśo 'smi vijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,  ayam atimāna iti /  mānātimānaḥ śreyasaḥ kulavijñānavittair aham eva śreyān kulavijñānavittair iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
ayaṃ mānātimānaḥ /  asmimānaḥ pañcopādānaskandhān iti /  chandarāgau hy atropādānam /
ata etad eva dvayamupādānam ity ucyate /
